title: Corniglia - The Hidden Gem of Cinque Terre

seo.title: Corniglia Travel Guide 2025 | The Village Above the Sea
seo.description: Discover Corniglia, Cinque Terre's hidden gem perched high on cliffs. The only village without direct sea access, reached by the famous 382-step Lardarina staircase, surrounded by vineyards.

body.title: Corniglia
body.subtitle: Perched 100 meters above the Mediterranean, Corniglia is Cinque Terre's most peaceful village. The only one without direct sea access, reached by climbing the legendary 382-step Lardarina staircase. Surrounded by terraced vineyards producing excellent white wine.

body.title: Authentic Cinque Terre Experience
body.subtitle: Fewer crowds, local atmosphere, stunning panoramic views.

features.title: The Lardarina Staircase
features.description: Famous 382-step brick staircase climbing from the train station to the village. A rite of passage for every visitor.

features.title: Ancient Vineyards
features.description: Surrounded by terraced vineyards producing Vernaccia white wine. The agricultural heart of Cinque Terre.

features.title: Peaceful Atmosphere
features.description: Fewest tourists of all five villages. Experience authentic local life away from the crowds.

features.title: Panoramic Terraces
features.description: Breathtaking 360-degree views from the clifftop position. See three other villages from various viewpoints.

features.title: Best Hiking Access
features.description: Central position makes it ideal for hiking to other villages. Well-connected to all major trails.

features.title: Local Cuisine
features.description: Traditional trattorias serving local families for generations. Authentic recipes without tourist markup.

body.title: Experience the Real Cinque Terre
body.subtitle: Climb the Lardarina, taste local wine, and discover why Corniglia rewards those who make the effort.
